analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x78fe77e988967e84d5c897b03433c6edc460fdec.sol:
	Contract Aramco has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x78fe77e988967e84d5c897b03433c6edc460fdec.sol#212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x78fe77e988967e84d5c897b03433c6edc460fdec.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/13/0x78fe77e988967e84d5c897b03433c6edc460fdec.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x78fe77e988967e84d5c897b03433c6edc460fdec.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
